docs: the room we had , had 2 queen beds plus a pull - out couchthe building is nice , the room was large , everything nice and clean .it was very clean , comfortable , and quiet .rooms are good butthe bathroom very small . </DOC> pocket door to washroom in bad shape .one bulb was burned out and the tv remote did n't have a battery cover . </DOC> bed was very comfortable here and the wi - fi is fast ., i like to workout , i envisioned a suite or something with separate workout gear .instead i got an old , semi - broken elliptical machine crammed in between the foot of the bed and the wall .bed is excellent , very good matress , soft blankets and good pillows ; heating / ac quite noisy as almost always the case in the states ! !the cons : the room is tired . </DOC> overall , the hotel was fine but not excellent .the hotel is nicely updated .the room we were ultimately assigned ( 327 ) was quite spacious with ample room for this family of four for one night .nice , clean , modern rooms .the hotel has a great lobby . </DOC> the bathroom was quite spacious , all though i would have liked more counter room for my toiletries .the beds were very comfortable along with the pillows .the shower was nice with two shower heads .my room was very small but well appointed .the bed was good and the linens were nice . </DOC> still very nice and comfortable .the room needs an update to modernize the ambience and the bathroom could be made new .and it was very specious and nice . )the westin governor was a very nice property .our room itself was very large , two queen size beds , a couch , a chair & end table . </DOC> room is spacious and vey comfortably appointed .the rooms are insanely large , but with tons of unused / useless space and a tiny bathroom .comfy bed , small desk , chair as hard as a rock .the bed was super comfortable , room enormous , water hot with good pressure , although the bathroom was not as spotless as i remember from a few years ago .had a very spacious room . </DOC> the bathroom was amazingly small .the room is a good size but the decor is lacking .do n't know whether i got an upgrade , but the king room was very large and had plenty of room to spread out .the room was neat and everything was in working order ... did not have much of a view but the extra customer service and quality of the food exceeded my expectations .hotel is nicely refurbished .
summary: the beds were comfortable , but the room was quite small .the bed is a bit hard and uncomfortable , but this is a big hotel .in all - a great hotel and i would definitely stay there again .if we had to pay the room rate i could not find it to be</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
